messages.subject: First Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I was in Suncoast Video on Monday 31 May 2004 and was browsing thru when I chanced upon a three CD Box set titled, First Samuarai, the actor in in is
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I was in Suncoast Video on Monday 31 May 2004 and was browsing thru
when I chanced upon a three CD Box set titled, First Samuarai, the
actor in in is Tishiro Mifune.

I was wondering if anybody else has seen this set and if so have they
purchased or reviewed it as I am considering it, I think it was about
$30.00.

Any opinions?

Thanks
